name: Blockskit Base
author: blockskitdev
description: Blockskit Base is a modern and versatile WordPress theme designed for various types of websites including blogs, small businesses, startups, agencies, firms, e-commerce shops, personal portfolio sites, and more. It offers full-site-editing, allowing easy customization of all aspects of your site. With multiple templates, patterns, and style variations, it's suitable for different aesthetics. The theme is also compatible with popular plugins like Elementor, WooCommerce, and Spectra â€“ WordPress Gutenberg Blocks, adding extra functionality to your site.
